meanings.definition: To turn or rotate around a central point.
meanings.sent1: She twists the lid off the jar.
meanings.sent2: He twists the key in the lock to open the door.
meanings.sent3: The magician twists the rope into a knot and then magically untwists it.
meanings.sent4: The tornado twists through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The dancer twists and twirls gracefully on stage.

meanings.definition: A bend or curve in a road or path.
meanings.sent1: The road takes a sharp twist to the left.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trail has many twists and turns through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The twist in the river caused the water to flow in a circular motion.
meanings.sent4: The twist in the plot of the movie took the audience by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The twist in the road led them to a beautiful hidden waterfall.

meanings.definition: To distort or change the meaning of something.
meanings.sent1: He twists the truth to make himself look better.
meanings.sent2: The tabloid twists the facts to create sensational headlines.
meanings.sent3: The comedian twists the punchline of the joke for a funnier effect.
meanings.sent4: The politician twists the statistics to support their argument.
meanings.sent5: The artist twists reality in their abstract paintings.

meanings.definition: A sudden change in a story or plot.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a surprising twist at the end.
meanings.sent2: The novel's plot had many unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent3: The twist in the fairy tale made it more interesting for the children.
meanings.sent4: The twist in the mystery novel revealed the true culprit.
meanings.sent5: The twist in the play kept the audience on the edge of their seats.

meanings.sent1: She twists the strands of hair into a braid.
meanings.sent2: The vines twist around the tree trunk in a spiral pattern.
meanings.sent3: The branches of the trees twist together to form a natural archway.
meanings.sent4: The snake twists its body around the branch to climb higher.
meanings.sent5: The ivy twists and climbs up the side of the building.
